verses.name: Revelation 18:23
verses.text: And the light of a candle shall shine no more at all in thee; and the voice of the bridegroom and of the bride shall be heard no more at all in thee: for thy merchants were the great men of the earth; for by thy sorceries were all nations deceived.

verses.name: Revelation 18:24
verses.text: And in her was found the blood of prophets, and of saints, and of all that were slain upon the earth.
